title: Vanderpump Rules' Stassi Schroeder and Beau Clark reveal Rome as their destination wedding spot
text:
The Vanderpump Rules stars announced their engagement in July of this year.

And now Stassi Schroeder and Beau Clark are revealing more about their upcoming nuptials.

Together, they announced that they will be tying the knot in Italy, in an engagement shoot for People Magazine.

Rome, baby! Stassi Schroeder and Beau Clark revealed they'll be tying the knot in Rome, to People on Tuesday

'We have hired wedding planners and have chosen the location, 31-year-old author Schroeder said. 'It is going to be in Rome, Italy.

The location is said to be special for the couple as they traveled there together and the groom lived there during childhood.

She also said 'The thing we love doing the most together is traveling and feel like we spend most of our time in hotels — so we thought it was a good way to capture who we are as a couple.'

Special place: The location is said to be special for the couple as they traveled there together and the groom lived there during childhood

They announced their engagement with a silly snap of her and Clark posing with her sizable engagement ring at the Hollywood Forever cemetery on Wednesday afternoon.

'OMG. I feel like Meghan Markle,' Schroeder said on her Instagram post, along with the wedding ring emoji.

The 3.5 carat engagement ring is Clark's family heirloom from the early 1900's.

Lovebirds: Schroeder and Clark started dating in February 2018 and got engaged in July 2019 (pictured in 2019)

Expect their wedding to be glamorous and low key, the bride-to-be said 'I’m gonna have an elegant, intimate, small, romantic wedding.'

Schroeder and Clark started dating in February 2018, and in June of that year, Schroeder opened up about her relationship.

'I feel really lucky right now. I haven’t had a relationship like this,' Schroeder said on the Straight Up with Stassi podcast.

'I didn’t know that I could find someone that we’d just be best friends and love each other and he’d be so nice to me and supportive and the fact that this was his idea,' she added.
description: Stassi Schroeder and Beau Clark are revealing more about their upcoming nuptials. Together, they announced that they will be tying the knot in Italy, in an engagement shoot for People Magazine.
